data.actual_result: The "Tap to join server" text is right aligned, and the online and member count expands out to the right
data.expected_result: The "Tap to join server" text is center aligned, and the online and member count is entirely within the modal
data.short_description: Invite modal to servers has mis-aligned text and text that escapes the modal (4" devices only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Get an invite to a server with lots of members that you have not joined
